function bubbleSort(cards) { 
        let sorted = true; 
        for (let i = 1; i < cards.length; i +=1 ) { 
          if (cards[i].height < cards[i - 1].height) { 
            swapCard(cards, i, i - 1); 
            sorted=false; 
          } 
        } 
        if (!sorted) { 
          bubbleSort(cards); 
        }
      }
